organization.alternate_name: PEACE CDC, Esmirna Church, The Red House
organization.description:
Peace CDC provides after school services consists of healthy snack, homework assistance, reading, arts & crafts and physical education. The children's reading progress is quarterly evaluated through u0022oral reading fluency testu0022 provided by Nova University. The physical program is also evaluated by Nova University through the u0022Pacer Testu0022. 

Summer Camp 2016:
Will provide reading, math, physical education, arts & crafts, outdoor activities and weekly field trips to: Black Beard Water Park, Dave & Busters, Chuck E. Cheese, Movies, Rock Climbing, Jumparoo, etc. Breakfast, lunch, and 1 snacks will be served daily. Will be closed on July 4th.

Dates: June 13 - July 29
Enrollment will begin first week of April
organization.name: PEACE CDC, INC.
